klusters Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
Array< T >This Array class is a template class that provides arrays of simple types
AutoSaveThreadThread used to save automatically the document on a defined schedule
AutoSaveThread::AutoSaveEventInternal class use to inform the document object (KlustersDoc) that the thread has finished
BaseFrameFrame base class containing the following features:
ChannelColorsThis class represents the list of the channels with their associated id, colors and colors status (i.e the color has been changed or no)
ChannelListList of selectable, read-only items to be used to configure the order in which individual electrodes are displayed in the WaveformView
ClusterInformationDialog
Author:
Lynn Hazan <lynn.hazan@myrealbox.com> This class is the dialog used to gather cluster information
ClusterPaletteThis class represents the Cluster Panel of the application
ClusterPaletteIconViewItem
Author:
Lynn Hazan <lynn.hazan@myrealbox.com> This class represents the items in the clusterpalette
ClusterPaletteToolTip
Author:
Lynn Hazan <lynn.hazan@myrealbox.com> This class represents the custom toolTip class to be used in the clusterpalette
ClustersProvider
Author:
Lynn Hazan
ClusterUserInformation
Author:
Lynn Hazan <lynn.hazan@myrealbox.com> This class contains the information manually entered by the user about a cluster
ClusterViewView displaying spikes in the PCA feature space
ConfigurationThis is the one and only configuration object
CorrelationThreadThread used to compute the correlograms displayed in the CorrelationView
CorrelationThread::CorrelationsEventInternal class use to send information to the CorrelationView to inform it that the data requested have been collected
CorrelationViewView displaying auto- and cross-correlations of all selected clusters
DataThis class contains and manages the data
Data::CorrelogramIteratorSpecialized iterator on the latest correlation data stored by a request of a correlationTread for a given pair of clusters
Data::IteratorSpecialized iterator which iterate on the features contained in features for the cluster specified in the constructor
Data::SampleWaveformIteratorReturns an iterator on the latest waveform data stored by a request of a waveformTread for a given cluster
Data::TimeFrameWaveformIteratorReturns an iterator on the latest waveform data stored by a request of a waveformTread for a given cluster
Data::WaveformIteratorThis class a wrapper to waveform information (spikes, mean value and standard deviation)
DataProviderBase class for all the types of provider of data: TracesProvider,ClustersProvider, EventsProvider, SpikesProvider
ErrorMatrixThreadThread used to compute the Error Matrix
ErrorMatrixThread::ErrorMatrixEventInternal class use to send information to the ErrorMatrixView to inform it that the matrix has been computed
ErrorMatrixViewView displaying the Error Matrix
EventDescriptionClass used to compare strings in case-insensitive maner
EventsProviderThe class provides event data
GroupingAssistantEvaluates the fit of the CEM algorithm by computing the probability of missclassification
ItemColorsThis class represents the list of the items with their associated id, color and color status (i.e the color has been changed or not)
KlustersAppThe Klusters main window and central class
KlustersDocDocument object that can be used in conjunction with the classes KlustersApp and KlustersView to create a document-view model for MDI (Multiple Document Interface) based on KApplication and KDockMainWindow as main classes
KlustersDoc::CloseDocumentEventInternal class use to send information to the main window to inform it that the document could not be closed has there still have thread running
KlustersViewView widgets for the document instance (KlustersDoc instance) and is displayed as a MDI child window in the main view area of the KlustersApp class instance
KlustersXmlReaderClass reading the parameter xml file
MinMaxThreadThread used to compute the minimum and maximum values for each dimension (feature)
PairClass used to represent the clusters corresponding to a given correlogram
ParameterXmlModifierClass modifying the parameter xml file
pArray< T >This pArray class is a template class that provides arrays of classes containing pointers
PrefClusterViewClass representing the Cluster View configuration page of the Klusters preferences dialog
PrefDialogClass representing the Klusters preferences dialog
PrefGeneralClass representing the Klusters General Configuration page of the Klusters preferences dialog
PrefWaveformViewClass representing the Waveform View configuration page of the Klusters preferences dialog
ProcessLineMakerThis class receives the outputs of external processes launched by ProcessWidget
ProcessWidgetThis class launchs/stops external processes and displays their outputs
SaveThreadThread used to save the cluster file
SaveThread::SaveDoneEventInternal class use to send information to the application object (KlustersApp) concerning the save process
SortableTableThis class is a one or two line Array of dataType with a sort feature on one of the lines
TracesProviderClass providing the row recorded data (contained in a .dat or .eeg file)
TraceViewClass which draws the traces, cluster and event representations
TraceWidgetClass containing the TraceView and all the widgets used to select the position in the file
Utilities
Author:
Lynn Hazan
ViewWidgetBase class for the most of the views of the application (ClusterView, WaveformView, CorrelationView and ErrorMatrixView)
WaveformThreadThread used to retrieve the waveforms and compute the means and standard deviations which will be displayed in the WaveformView
WaveformThread::GetWaveformsEventInternal class use to send information to the WaveformView to inform it that the data requested have been collected
WaveformThread::NoWaveformDataEventInternal class use to send information to the WaveformView to inform it that there is not data available for the requested cluster
WaveformViewView displaying the waveforms of a subset of the spikes evenly spaced in time over the whole recording
ZoomWindowThis class is used to enable zoom feature
